text: Zaʙunsudagon ʙa qudratmandon gujand: «Na, sumo saʙu ruz hila mekarded, on goh ki moro farmon medoded, ki ʙa Xudoi jakto kofir savem va ʙaroi U sarikone qaror dihem!» Va cun azoʙro ʙuʙinand, dar dil pusajmoni kunand. Va Mo gulhoro ʙar gardani kofiron ʙiguzorem. Ojo na cunin ast, ki dar ʙaroʙari amalhojason cazo doda mesavand
